title: Love, Lust & Little Lies
description: Librarian note: An older cover for this edition can be found here.State Trooper Lacy Greene's youthful, gothic appearance makes her perfect for an undercover operation inside a local high school infested with drug dealers and gangs. But what she doesn't expect is to be attracted to a sexy gym teacher who has no idea who she really is.Damien Aolani has never been tempted by a student before. That doesn't stop his normally controlled manner from crumbling every time he is near his new student and TA So, what is it about Lacy that has her consuming every second of his thoughts?Sparks fly, but lies keep them apart. If the truth comes out, will it bring them together? Or destroy what could have been?
author: Cassandra Cripps
